page.title: 12INDUSTRY AROUND TODDINGTON
page.content: {Industry}in this area is on a small scale, only one{employing}more than six people. Many are either family businesses, or owned and run by one person. Most industries sell their products locally and most have been {trading}for many years, although a few have set up business within the last five years. Some industries are farm-related, such as the mushroom farm, a nursery which grows most of the plants it sells, a new and used farm machinery sales firm, and a meat packing company. Other industries of a more general nature include a baker, four builders, three furniture manufacturers, a fencing contractor, two small potteries, a motor body builder, a small publishing firm, two signwriters and a wrought-iron manufacturer.{Thatching}is a traditional industry in this area.
